website_summaries.verdict: This air fryer stays relatively cool to the touch while in use and won't heat up your kitchen on hot summer days.
pros: Indicator lights for heating and power
Comes with recipes, toaster rack and skewers
Temperature range from 180 degrees to 390 degrees Fahrenheit
Unit stays comfortable to the touch while frying
cons: This unit has analog controls, and the writing on the dial is a bit small

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 3 months...***Please read the Surprised Update***
customer_reviews.text: The fan stopped working, I only used it 1-2 times a week, small amounts for one. It has only been 3 months. Very sad. This is a surprised update... Just got an E-mail from the seller, and they are sending me a replacement...A REPLACEMENT!! This seller is the best, I loved my Air Fryer and I do not blame them for a rare failure, parts do fail, but the speed and care that the are showing a customer is amazing. I recommend them to everyone, this is just amazing, I wrote this review yesterday and they responded in less than 18 hrs. If only all Sellers cared this much. Thank you, Thank you, Thank you, and again Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Doug wollenburg

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, Easy To Use Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and easy to use. My teens prefer to cook using the air fryer instead of the oven. The little book that provides guidelines for cooking time and temperature were a nice touch. The images on the front of the air fryer provide temperature information but the book provides guidelines on length of time to cook the food. It even provides suggestions on when to add a little oil to what you are cooking. Having the air fryer has made life easier. No messy oil cleanup and no lingering fried oil smell in the house which I used to hate. Everything turns out crisp and delicious. This was definitely well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chaun Gem

customer_reviews.title: New Appliance For Healthy Cooking A Big Success!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter raved about her Air Fryer. I used it when I took care of my two grandsons and I decided to buy one of my own. After reviewing a number of brands I decided on the Extra Large Capacity Secura. It was the fact I could make Kabobs in it that sold me. The Kabobs have been simple and easy to make. I am still experimenting with other things, but I have made a great decision to purchase this new appliance. Healthy eating is a big concern in our family.
customer_reviews.author: TheBoysGrandma

customer_reviews.title: A buy you will not regret !
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably good buy. I am very,very pleased with it. After I acquired it, I no longer use my Kitchen Aid oven. Even reheating pizzas or bread is great in this device. I am beyond happy. The price is absolutely unbeatable,and the quality is a great match to it as well. It fries large and small cut potatoes, whole potatoes, chicken comes out very juicy. Just wipe clean and start using again. I put foil underneath the tray and replace it after each frying session. The bottom stays clean . I can easily fry 2 large quarters of the chicken or 6 large whole potatoes at once.
customer_reviews.author: Azeriqizi

customer_reviews.title: so their instructions were useless. I returned it to Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I arrived without the skewers. The basket would not release. I called Customer Service. They asked me all sorts of questions regarding the order number, details of my purchase, etc. Then she told me that there was no one to actually speak to me, and that I would receive a response by email only in 1-2 days. I received an email without comment about the missing part, and instructions on how to release the basket. But the basket was not working, so their instructions were useless. I returned it to Amazon. I would not suggest purchasing this air fryer, because they do not have any American based customer or technical support.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppingmavin

customer_reviews.title: Cajun chicken and chicken veggie skewers yay !
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, my kids love french fries. Now we make them ourselves at home. Healthier option. Thanks Secura. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anutayatuta

customer_reviews.title: it can’t be a new fryer. The surface is ...
customer_reviews.text: it can’t be a new fryer. The surface is already chipped and the knob clip is loose. The basket frame does not look even. There is a paper board under the fryer basket that is screwed by 3 nails. The basket is also covered with the vinyl from the bottom. I had to reomove the vinyl and the wrapping after taking out the 3 screws. If I cook with this fryer, I will consume all the melted plastic in it. I decided to return after doing this because I cannot trust this item at all.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bek

customer_reviews.title: don't buy, doesn't last a year
customer_reviews.text: after a year with little use it just stopped working, very unhappy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Gildea

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and clean but I went to warm ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this air fryer 10 months ago and used it fairly often. It is easy to use and clean but I went to warm something up in it last week and it has quit working. It says it has a two year warranty but I am not sure how to return it. I will definitely get another air fryer just don't think it will be this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: secura air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I like that this unit is simple, decent size, no digital or touch screen. I have used it several time and so far so good cooking will be a learning curve and amazon offers a free kindle air fryer book that helps too
customer_reviews.author: ken g

customer_reviews.title: Love my air fryer
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to use and clean afterwards. Fries are amazing. Mozzarella sticks needed to be at a higher temp. Baked cinnamon rolls too
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Have used it every day and works fine. I gave it a 3 because of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used it every day and works fine. I gave it a 3 because of the ridiculously tiny lettering around the timing dial.. Not only are the numbers tiny, they're not very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Everyone in the family likes it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air fryer on line and when it arrived, my husband said,"Oh great. Another appliance!" For lunch that same day I put a handful of frozen tater tots in the bin to try the air fryer out. My husband ate them all. His comment, "These are better than you get at a restaurant." I made him more for dinner. That evening he wanted a lesson in how to operate and clean up the air fryer because I was going to be gone the next day. Someone in our family uses it everyday. Best thing we have bought in quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I love this appliance
customer_reviews.text: I love this appliance! It is easy to clean and makes the best french fries - perfectly crispy with very little oil (just enough to coat them). I made the Bloomin' Onion (recipe in the enclosed cook book) - it was amazing. This unit is quiet and easy to clean and use. The large basket holds enough for our dinner (two people) and my husbands lunch to take to work the next day. I would purchase this again. I read all the reviews on all of the larger air fryers and microwave/convection ovens before purchasing this and would make the same decision. I love this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Lori McAninch

customer_reviews.title: Spontaneous electrical meltdown after one year
customer_reviews.text: Suddenly have an electrical meltdown after 1 years light use. Fortunately we were in the kitchen so a fire was prevented.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L

customer_reviews.title: Ok overall, but with an extremely annoying design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Air fryers are basically toaster ovens with enhanced convection mode on all the time. They do work better than regular toast ovens in certain tasks, such as reheating french fries or chicken nuggets. This fryer is of medium size, and the power level is adequate. The non-stick coating works fine. The elevated wire stand meant to help air circulation is, however, very poorly designed and built. The gaps are way too big to keep fries or nuggets in place. It also comes without coating, and therefore always ends up with food sticking to it. Using it is a constant struggle and source of frustration.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wang

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this.
customer_reviews.text: Super fast way of cooking a lot of stuff. I have used this to cook chicken breasts and hamburgers. My dog is older and can only eat a limited number of foods. SO we cook hamburger for her. This will let me cook 10 burgers at a time, using the rack to stand them on their side. In just 10 minutes, I have ten burgers with most of the grease drained into the bottom. Super easy clean up. Just fill with hot water and wipe out. I got this to cook fries, but have been using it to cook everything else. While we have a regular oven, this is much faster. No preheating. Also, it's super quiet.

customer_reviews.title: Timer broke after a year.
customer_reviews.text: I had this fryer for a little over a year. I used it maybe once a month or so. The timer no longer moves So it will stay on forever if I l don't turn it off. Other than that I really like it but the timer not working makes it a little dangerous to use. For now I just use a smart plug with it or set a timer on my phone. I think it might be still a safe buy. I don't see any other reviews with this problem but you might consider one with a digital timer instead, less moving parts.
customer_reviews.author: BaronTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Air Fryers live up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: For anyone thinking about getting an air fryer, do it! I use mine all the time and it really does "fry" chicken with a crispy crust. It is not a time saver necessarily, but it is a nice appliance that doesn't heat up your kitchen like the oven does. My favorite thing to make in it is bacon and my house doesn't end up smelling like bacon for the next week and a half. It is easy to clean since you just toss it in the dishwasher. The dials are a little cheap, especially for the price of the product, and that is the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Curlygirl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t need more expensive one than this! Don’t go smaller either.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! This is amazing, everything is coming out perfect. I had debated about buying a philips or more expensive one but no need! The large size is recommended, any smaller and would be hard to make a family serving (4) of fries without doing in multiple batches. So easy to use and clean too. 4 weeks later: seriously life changing! Chicken breasts, fish, meatballs, charred broccoli and cauliflower w olive oil and salt taste better than you’ve ever cooked them! Has made us crave the healthy foods we used to begrudgingly choose over less healthy options. SO worth the investment, has become our weeknight go-to for everything!
customer_reviews.author: Sara M. Colic

customer_reviews.title: Just a little bit oil makes super crispy fried chickenh
customer_reviews.text: Just got this air fryer today. Easy to use and clean! Just a little bit oil makes super crispy fried chicken. Taste is amazing!!! I will try more recipes. Some people mentioned that their fryer broke after a few months. Hopefully it won’t happen! Update I tried more recipes Crispy noodle was amazing! Chicken with salt lemon paper turned out incredible. Fried potatoes didn’t come out good but I think that was my fault. I recommend my friends and some were buying it too
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Broken? Or just junk?!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this! And it was a splurge for me. It’s making the worst noises, and I’ve asked a couple people, they say no it absolutely should not sound like that. I wish I could load my video of the noise. It makes me scared to even use it
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase after other brand died early
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy so far. We originally had an as seen on TV model (different brand) that died under a year and couldn't find our proof of purchase. This is a simpler design (no touch buttons or preset cooking modes), and to be honest that is preferred. This thing cooks extremely quick and with the right settings cooks just about anything. Our previous unit also had a round basket, this square design seems much better suited to the job. There really isn't anything I can think of as a negative. Just hoping this brand last longer than my last unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Goforth

customer_reviews.title: Great price to get you into the Air Fryer community
customer_reviews.text: Great price to get you into the Air Fryer community. I didn't do much research before I purchased this one - but now that I know more about air fryers, I am very satisfied with this. Large, square basket that holds a lot. Easy to wash and use. Comes with a wire "ledge" so you can cook another layer at a time but I feel this slows down the cooking process. Very happy with this purchase and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far a great air fryer! I follow a healthy lifestyle so this appliance is important to me. I have owned to Philips air fryer. They were both very expensive and did not last long. I read the reviews on this air Secura fryer and thought let me give it a try. I love it! It is easier to use, faster, the clean up is quick and easy, everything I have made in this air fryer has a awesome taste and texture. I just bought a second one as a gift. Stop reading the reviews and buy this air fryer, you will be so happy
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: after 10 month, the time dial button do not ...
customer_reviews.text: after 10 month , the time dial button do not turn off even when it reach the off or cero, but they offered to change the equipment immediately 5-star to custom service.
customer_reviews.author: Rima G.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WAIT - BUY ONE NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a big, nor great, cook...HOWEVER, this makes EVERYTHING so freaking easy!!! I've cooked jalapenos, steak, burgers, pork chops, French fries, tator tots, bacon wrapped jalapenos, asparagus, etc. It's the easiest thing ever! I was always a big griller...not anymore...the meat tastes just as good as grilling, BUT so much jucier. I really can't say enough good things about this one...OH AND THE SIZE...it really is extra large! All I can say in closing is - GO BUY ONE NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been air frying everything since I bought this. It is awesome and clean up is a breeze. My only complaint are the dials - I wish they were a little more exact. It only shows some numbers with dots in between, so you kind of have to guess the time and temperature. But it is still usable, just would be easier with more exact dials.
customer_reviews.author: Alana P.

customer_reviews.title: but I wouldn't recommend this to anyone with any respiratory issues
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure if the item is defective, but I wouldn't recommend this to anyone with any respiratory issues. This product gives off a horribly strong electrical smell. I had to turn on the vent and open a window. Very unpleasant experience. It may just be the item is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: A good air fryer but not over 100.00
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago under 70.00 and thought that was the regular price, turns out it's 105.00. At the time I was looking for something durable and affordable. It's great for fried chicken even double battered with very little oil as well as beef and fish. The drawback cleaning the basket but it's big enough to hold a lot of food for its size. For the most part it's worthy of the cost if it were under 100.00
customer_reviews.author: Earl Flynn

customer_reviews.title: horrible at cooking food
customer_reviews.text: I'm very surprised by the reviews for this thing. I've had it for a while now, and I have never been able to get anything to cook correctly in this thing. When cooking food, half of it will be burnt and the other half will be totally under cooked. You basically have to stand there and take the food out every minute and move it around. Actually, even that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Meyer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: Use this for anything and everything I normally cook in the oven or reheat in the microwave. Makes food crispy! Clean up at first was very easy but seems to get harder everytime for some reason Update, I ran the basket through the dishwasher and it is junk now. Loved it the first year, but it is not easy cleanup or dishwasher safe as advertised. Update, still using this but the basket is just gross and won't come clean so we line it with foil. I will definately buy another air fryer but just not this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Lasted exactly one month
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered on October 12. We used it very occasionally and lightly to do French fries and to heat up food such as naan break. It stopped working after four weeks. Now I have to go out of my way to send it back for repairs. A total waste of my money and my time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Madison

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations in performance.
customer_reviews.text: Best small appliance I've bought. Wanted to give the air fryer concept a try but didn't want to spend to much on one until I knew I'd use it. Not much into the digital bru-ha on my appliances so found the Secura Air Fryer just what I needed to check it out. Haven't used the oven or stove top deep frying since I got it! Best product to check out what air frying is all about; easy to use, no confusing digital settings, powerful, easy to set and clean. Just got a second one for my 80 year old mom. She loves it and now she's teaching the family new air fryer recipes. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jose V. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase EVER!
customer_reviews.text: We love to cook items that are usually cooked, fried, or otherwise prepared with oil and grease. Since we purchased this fryer, we are preparing everything grease-free. The cooking time is VERY short, and the food always turned out fantastic. Clean up in easy since we can put the basket into the dishwasher. A total winner that helps us to eat healthier and lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Huge... but great!
customer_reviews.text: This appliance won't fit on my counter underneath my cabinets nor will it fit inside any cupboards so we have to keep it in the garage. It's just two inches too tall and it's very wide. It does a great job cooking the food and super fast. I would recommend lightly spraying the food before cooking with some oil to add moisture and crispiness. Overall great, just wish I knew how large it is.
customer_reviews.author: David Lair

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews and comparing I chose this one. Does many things well. French fries from frozen in as little as 7 or 8 minutes without heating up the house! Makes nice crispy flour tortilla wraps without oil. Grills hotdogs nicely in about 4 to 5 minutes. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Basket size isn’t huge
customer_reviews.text: I tried my air fryer for the first time making fried chicken. It worked great and tasted great but I could only cook two (rather large) pieces at a time so it did take quite a while to cook all 6 pieces, although each batch only took about 20 minutes. Regardless, I would recommend. It says that all pieces are dishwasher safe but I decided to hand wash just to be safe. I’m excited to try new recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Justus

customer_reviews.title: My go to Cooking Equipment
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to tell you what, if you don’t have an air fryer now you better run out and get one. We’ve had one for a while now and I tell you what it never disappoints. And I’m not just saying that we cook everything in this bad boy. These little Porkchop medallions rubbed in this magic seasoning which I love and I use this one on everything pretty much not just chicken, but 15 minutes in the air fryer and you got a really yummy moist tender pork tenderloin. I got a bag of frozen peas in the microwave and a instant pack of instant Idaho red potatoes. So easy and delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline P. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: I'm thoroughly enjoying this machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in order to try it out before buying one for my son and daughter-in-law who live in Indonesia and don't have an oven. It's great! I live alone and mainly use it to cook salmon, and chicken. Perfect for one or two people, and lots of recipes online for air fryers. The only drawback is that the timer knob is not terribly precise, so I always but on my microwave timer when cooking. Very easy to clean. I never put it in the dishwasher, because I use it so often.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen W.

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased. Cooked wings in a tablespoon of oil
customer_reviews.text: Haven't learned everything about how to use it yet, but the few times I have used it, I was very pleased. Cooked wings in a tablespoon of oil. They came out nice & crisp. Also did frozen French fries, they turned out good too.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia cleckler

customer_reviews.title: Great easy cooking
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using an air fryer. I am glad I bought a larger unit. Even this size limits how much can be cooked at one time. Cooking is easy & relatively fast. Clean up is extremely easy. Finding good recipes & easy recipes & learning what works & what doesn't is a little tougher. I have used it the last 2 days since I received it. The chicken wings worked great. I made pork chops last night which were just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Love this!  Use every night!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! I was skeptical about buying a big, bulky product that I wouldn’t use and have to store but this has a permanent spot on my counter! EVERYTHING we have cooked in this has been perfect! It’s like having a toaster oven and fryer in one but not all of the unhealthy oil. Chicken, vegetables, anything frozen (fish, mozzarella sticks, potato skins) all come out perfect and quick! This model has a large basket and VERY easy cleanup. I just put the basket in the dishwasher. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wright

customer_reviews.title: It makes the best grilled cheese you have ever had
customer_reviews.text: My co worker told me about her air fryer and convinced me to get one. I don't fry foods but miss that crispness. It arrived a couple days ago and I have tried several items in it. I'm hooked!! It makes the best grilled cheese you have ever had! Did turkey bacon this morning and it was crispy! Chicken/ veg kabobs I did yest were awesome!! This has changed the way I cook!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Quick, Clean, Saves Money.
customer_reviews.text: This works really well so far for everything we've tried. You do have to give yourself some extra time to cook multiple batches when making larger quantities, but you have to do that when frying in a pan as well. The clean-up in this thing is a dream, and I love how you don't need to pre-heat. If you're the kind of person who frequently uses a toaster oven and enjoys fried food, I definitely recommend this air fryer. Also, if you're trying to consume healthy, more expensive fats, such as coconut oil, palm oil, and lard, using the air fryer saves a lot of money since you're not filling a giant pan with expensive coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Case

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job of a Big Oven
customer_reviews.text: I do love this air fryer, do not regret the purchase at all, am having fun experimenting. It is ideal as now I do not have to use my big useless oven anymore and will also save me cleaning it. I would have given it 5 star, just the little plastic bit on the handle worries me in case it would break. It seems strong enough though. And I hope it will last.
customer_reviews.author: RosAnn

customer_reviews.title: ... necessarily the quality of the product but I am disappointed. Everything takes twice as long as the instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's necessarily the quality of the product but I am disappointed. Everything takes twice as long as the instructions say it should so what is the point? Also the basket is really small so I usually need to do 2 portions which takes twice as long. And finally it would have been really nice if it had come with even a better selection of recipes.
customer_reviews.author: LisaR

customer_reviews.title: If you have a good oven, just use it instead.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was excited about my air fryer, but it is basically a small oven and cluttering up my counter now. I really thought it would make a difference. Most the time I need to add a bit of oil or it gets way too dry. That doesn't happen in the oven. The only reason I'll keep using it is because it is a lot easier for clean up and I paid money for it and will use it until I can't anymore. But honestly, if you have a good oven just use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie J

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying having this in our kitchen. We burnt our first batch of French fries, but we learned to not just set the timer and let it do its thing. We set the timer for close to the time we figure it will take, but check the product several times during the cooking process to get it just right. I have made cheese crisps in it. I love my frozen burritos crispy, so I thaw them out a bit in the microwave, spray Pam on both sides, then start it up in the air fryer; so good!
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: What did we ever so without this air fryer?! It is fast, quiet, and doesn't heat up the kitchen like oil frying. Beyond EASY to clean. So far, I have made perfect chicken tenders from scratch, egg rolls, pot stickers, and some frozen junk food that my hubby wanted to try. Everything turned out golden, crispy, and delicious.....and NOT greasy. I will update this review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: jamie1972

customer_reviews.title: Makes great food without the mess
customer_reviews.text: I really really like this product, I actually used it last night making fried catfish. At first I was having a problem getting the skin on fish to have that “crunch” as if you put it in oil and fried it. But after trial and error I now have the same tasting outcome without the hassle of cleaning up oil splatter all over the place. FYI just lightly spray it with an oil and your good to go. For all other food products it works great as well. Makes delicious wings and fries. I did go with the bigger 4.2 qt simply because I like lots of food.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Noll

customer_reviews.title: Love our air fryer
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bigger Air Fryer than the one we had. Love the bigger area and being able to cook things like chicken strips and fries together. We haven't used the included rack yet, but might sometime. Cleaning is pretty easy. I had melted cheese in there, soaked with some hot water and soap, and rinsed cleaned. Very happy with this model. I didn't want something with digital keys etc, because that is more to fail. The simple knobs on this work well enough for us. Comes with a book with cooking temps, which is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve ever made
customer_reviews.text: This air fryer is amazing! Size is great for a family of 4 like mine. It’s easy to clean and food tastes delicious ALL THE TIME! I love the fact that you could make anything in the air fryer (yes I use it Daily!) And food cooks faster than regular stove/oven option.
customer_reviews.author: johanna falconi

customer_reviews.title: Large basket
customer_reviews.text: I've had a little over a week. Have used it to make fresh and frozen fries; fresh and frozen chicken; and fish filets. Everything came out excellent. It's faster than baking (by half) but slower than my deep fryer (again, by half). Example: frozen fries. Oven 35 mins.-air fryer 18 mins-deep fryer 8 mins. They all come out crispy but the first two have no added grease. You'll be glad you changed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Nevel

customer_reviews.title: Melting/Burning Plastic Smell, then fine .. (!?)
customer_reviews.text: Smoke came out and there was a terrible melting plastic smell the first time we turned it on. Later we turned in on for 20 minutes again, there was a slight melting plastic smell, then there was none. It's working fine now. As far as we could tell there was nothing foreign inside it that could have burned. I used to work making circuit boards and it was a familiar thing to me, it usually meant we left some part or wire touching something hot, left a sticker on something, etc. Otherwise it's a great air fryer, we use it for everything now. But -2 stars for bad quality control
customer_reviews.author: Roy Wilkie

customer_reviews.title: Claims to come with recipes, but it's really an ...
customer_reviews.text: Claims to come with recipes, but it's really an instruction manual with just a few recipes. I went out and bought an air fryer recipe book, but now realize this air fryer doesn't have the metal pan accessories that many recipes require. If I had known this I would never had purchased this air fryer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to clean and use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean, large capacity. I have only used it 4 times but am really surprised at how well it works. The price was decent, so we’ll see how it lasts. I have recommended it to my friends already, hope it doesn’t disappoint!! Edited to add: Have cooked t-bone steaks which came great! Also have used for several other meals, am still happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L.Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Love this air fryer, but I'm not sure about durability
customer_reviews.text: I really like this air fryer. I had it for almost 3 months and it helped me out with my diet. However I am truly upset about the durability, part of the handle cracked after it fell on floor due to my hands being slippery. I hope if there's anyway that I can get a replacement just for the basket
customer_reviews.author: Woohoo!

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. You need it.
customer_reviews.text: How did I wait to long to get an air fryer?! With an always hangry toddler, I have about 15-20 minutes to get something on the table when we get home before he attacks. The air fryer cooks chicken, pork, beef, chicken tenders, ANYTHING you want perfectly juicy and quick! It's been a total game changer for my house. Anything that you've wanted to be crispy but can't get just right in the oven, the air fryer will do it without all of the grease. I would say that this size is just right for a 2-3 person household. I would browse bigger options if you have a bigger family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually comparable to an oil fryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. We've used this to cook bacon, French fries, potato wedges from fresh potatoes, taquitos, tortilla chips from fresh tortillas, and chicken wings. All turned out crispy and like they were fried rather than baked, but without the heavy oil taste. It's also great for reheating fried food leftovers. Definitely recommend this if you're looking to try an air fryer. Update December 2018: We use this fryer every day. It is an essential appliance in our kitchen, and I'm so glad this is the one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Stephie M

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I live alone and use this every day. For a family it would make side-dishes. It doesn't give off much heat so is good for summer cooking. I bought one for my daughter in southern Illinois and it is all she uses in the summer heat. It would be nice if the minutes could be set individually because it is marked in 5 minute increments. Sometimes I just set it for whatever approximate time I want and then set a timer on my microwave.
customer_reviews.author: R. Springer

customer_reviews.title: New to Air Frying
customer_reviews.text: This is my first air fryer, but so far I like it. Stuff doesn't taste like fried, but then I didn't expect it to. Does make stuff much crispier than the oven. The air fryer works great. I have only used it a half dozen times, but I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: DebMc

customer_reviews.title: Great air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my secura air fryer. It’s a decent size for 2 people but I may have preferred a larger size. Making this size work for us though. The bucket under the frying basket is a non-stick surface so it has been easy to wipe down for cleaning. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love this air fryer
customer_reviews.text: Love this air fryer! Very easy to clean, and air fries food very quickly. Somewhat bulky, and capacity of bin could be larger. (Only five chicken thighs fit in this "extra large capacity" 4,2 Qt air fryer). Despite the relatively small capacity, and bulk, its speed, frying with minimal oil, price, and ease of cleaniing, still makes this a Five Star product.
customer_reviews.author: kkmk

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye, Stove
customer_reviews.text: Since I purchased this air fryer, I have not used my stove much. It cooks meat and fish, and even cheesecakes. Easy to clean, too. Also, much faster than a conventional oven. I can cook pork ribs in around 10 minutes. I had been thinking of buying a new stove, but I think I will spend the $600.00 on something else. BTW, I am talking about cooking for one or two.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t used the oven since ...
customer_reviews.text: As a fitness Competitor I am always looking for ways to make my meals as healthy as possible the air fryer has been fantastic this is the perfect size for those of you with families I have beat everything from chicken thighs french fries potatoes veggies you name it there’s no smell easy cleanup and as a single mom of three it is time efficient... My son even knows how to use this all by himself to make his morning burritos it’s a must kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.author: Francesca.fit

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this air fryer for my wife for Christmas. We really enjoyed this item while it worked. Suddenly after only six weeks it stopped working, no heat, no fan, no nothing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: We did a lot of research prior to purchasing & wanted to keep the price reasonable since we had just downsized & gotten rid of many of our kitchen items. This air fryer is very easy to use with minimal mechanics to "go wrong", very easy to clean & big enough for the 2 of us. We use it 1 to 2 times daily...cooking everything from eggs to dessert! I would highly recommend this air fryer!
customer_reviews.author: Jody Agins

customer_reviews.title: Great little air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had mine for 2 years and I still have no complaints. It’s is small but I knew that when I bought it. The non stick has held up good....Some reviews said it did not for them. Literally nothing is different about it and I use it almost everyday. I have cooked bacon, chicken breast, sweet potatoes, Irish potatoes, frozen chicken nuggets, monzarella sticks, biscuits, pork loin, pork chops, hamburger patties, smoked sausages. Cooks great! To clean I wait for it to cool wipe it out and when necessary fill it with soapy water and wash it burn on cheese comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen appliance ever
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly the best kitchen appliance I have ever bought. My only gripe is that the cooking area is small - I guess that is required for it to work its magic - but the food comes out fantastic! My go to boneless, skinless chicken thighs - it really gives the outside some nice crunch/texture like it was fried in oil, but way easier, and the inside is juicy and delicious. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this air fryer! The basket is a very generous side and is extremely easy to keep clean. I like the sliding cover over the basket release because it keeps me from pressing it absentmindedly. The only thing I would have liked different is more detail on the timer and temperature knobs. Some recipes I’ve tried call for odd cook times or temperatures that I have to “guesstimate” because they aren’t marked or digitally programmable.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa E.

customer_reviews.title: Great must have in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: So far the air fryer is holding up well. I've cooked a number of easy items in this as it was my main purpose of buying. I work from home and it is nice to have a oven that only takes a few minutes to cook your items so you can eat before your break is over. You really have to figure out your cooking times, but other than that I am very happy with my purchase. Looking forward to cooking new items in my fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex in Springfield

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second air fryer. My first was from a much better known company and cost over twice as much. I like this product better. It has more room and is quieter. The only problem is that it has a top temp of 390F and many recipes call for a cooking temp of 400F. Of course, it works fine if you adjust the timing. I definitely recommend this fryer.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I absolutely love this thing. It's so easy to use and make some of our favorite foods even quicker than our counter top Breville convection oven. It's also even safer to use for my pre-teen to make his own snacks/meals. I'd definitely buy again, and if I were giving any advice, I'd just buy a bigger one!
customer_reviews.author: KWatson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your kitchen from overheating!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this a few times now and wonder why I hadn't found it earlier! I tried a couple of easy recipes included in the owners manual and they turned out perfectly. Saved a ton of recipes on Pinterest and ready to try different things. Love that it creates a hot meal w/o heating up my kitchen! I do see some plastic has melted on both corners on the front of my fryer, though, which is a bit disconcerting!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Cooks chicken wings to perfection
customer_reviews.text: This Air Fryer is affordable and still works like a $100+ unit. No plastic smell if you clean the unit when you first open it and before your first use set it to 400°F and let it run for 30 mins with basket inside.
customer_reviews.author: Dreadhead

customer_reviews.title: basket broke unable to dislodge to clean
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product - however after only using the air fryer a handful of times the handle and basket are stuck together and i cannot clean the unit properly- I would love to give it 5 stars but cannot since its now broken-
customer_reviews.author: L A Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I love how much easier the basket is to clean vs. the previous AF I owned which didn't even last 2 years with minimal use. The company/seller seems very proactive and wants to make sure each customer is happy with their purchase. That's worth a lot these days!
customer_reviews.author: Darla Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this gadget cooker! I have cooked many things but my favorite is chicken wings. So so easy. I usually cook them from frozen because I tend to forget until I want them, and they are perfect! I love that there is no fat on them and super crispy. I also cook bacon, regular and turkey and it is better then pan cooked. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Ok soooo didn’t believe the hype with these air fryers. Heard soooo many Stories of them then I Tasted frozen chicken nuggets from someone that had an air fryer and decided to find one for myself. Well fast forward to this product on Amazon, this one right here woooooo better than any real oven I’ve ever eaten from - ever. I mean absolutely mind blowing. Totally changed the game...if you have no oven you definitely wouldn’t realize it with this!! Amazing product~ You can cook anything in it it’s literally a mini oven....on steroids!! Bacon wrapped scallops just to name a few~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the first air fryer I have purchased. It is very simple to use in that it only has two buttons (dials): one for time and the other for temperature. I made hash browns on the first day I had it and they came out very good and crispy. The unit basket is also very easy to clean as it has a Teflon type coating on it!
customer_reviews.author: Louisa Lee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air fryer for my parents for christmas last year. They used it a handful of times and didn't like air fryer food. So about 4 months ago, they gave it to me to use instead of donating it to a thrift store. I have used it maybe 10 times and today it just stopped working. I had food inside and the fan/element went off, no lights, but the timer was still going. I unplugged it, checked the outlet, I can't figure out what happened except it just doesn't last. I paid over $100 when I bought it and I expected it to last longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: So we love this air fryer
customer_reviews.text: So we love this air fryer. We’ve cooked wings in it twice and they were delicious. We didn’t even add any seasoning other than salt. It is worth the money. We plan to try it for more things, we just haven’t had a chance. A better cookbook to accompany the air fryer would have been nice. That so far, would be my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Timer stoped working afte4 two months.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first, used once per week on average but after only two months the timer stopped working and now it is useless as the return window has closed. Only large enough for 1 to 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars, only because I think I received a defective item. Upon starting the air fryer, it makes an awfully loud rattling noise. Hoping to return it and get a replacement soon, but I had requested a replacement and then canceled it because the rattling stopped. After using it the next day, the rattling started up again. It's very random! But the noise is unbearable enough that I want to return the item. Other than that, I think the item is topnotch. I will update my review to 5 stars if I get a replacement that does not make that horrible sound.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Oakes

customer_reviews.title: So far we have used it for chicken tenders and french fries and some pizza snacks and all were so much better tasting than any oven or microwave could have done
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted an air fryer, among other things, for Christmas so she got this from me. So far we have used it for chicken tenders and french fries and some pizza snacks and all were so much better tasting than any oven or microwave could have done. My wife will be trying some other foods in it and has read the booklet extensively. She initially had a little trouble opening it but now has the knack. This is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit
customer_reviews.text: Nice item works very well and a good size for our family of four. The only outside is that the recommended roomed especially for French fries are a bit of and you may want to monitor closely with your favorite foods to decide time and temp settings you are most comfortable with
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs this.
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made in a while. I was skeptical about buying this and still having good quality tasting food come out of this. I have not been disappointed about anything I've made. Steak, burgers, potatoes, even a cake. I wish I'd bought this sooner. I'm in love. And clean up is so easy. I ordered this on a Friday night and it was on my porch Sunday morning. Fast shipping is always a plus. Now I know what to buy for family members when it's time to buy gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Slimb103

customer_reviews.title: I typically cook for 1-2 people This fryer is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: It takes half the time that my big oven does, and doesn't heat up the kitchen. Clean up is super easy too. When I buy packaged frozen foods like chicken nuggets, fries, tater tots, taquitos, etc, I look at the directions for the regular ove, and cut the time in half. Everything comes out perfect and no grease.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stanchfield

customer_reviews.title: Very happy except for the Teflon.
customer_reviews.text: I only cover the bottom of the fry basket with fries. I dont fill the entire thing. I typicaly only have to run the fryer for 2 rounds of 5 minutes with a stir in between. I dont like the cancer causing Teflon, so i am going to fabricate another basket to fit inside made out of stainless steel strainer mesh. This fryer is so much faster and uses so much less electricity that doing them in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: chadjason

customer_reviews.title: How did I ever survive?
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this air fryer! I don't know how I ever survived without one. It has been instrumental in weekly meal prep; cutting my prep time nearly in half without heating up my kitchen- this was key during the height of summer. Counter space in my house is limited, but I use the air fryer so frequently that it never gets put away.
customer_reviews.author: trailrunner21

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean. Great product. Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The more we experiment with cooking things in it the more we use and like it. We now use it almost everyday. So far usually to cook some type of side dish (french fries, onion rings, pierogies, spring rolls, etc.) but more and more often now also to cook various frozen chicken strips, fish, etc.. It’s very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy E.

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye grease
customer_reviews.text: I am an active runner and cyclist. Always looking for ways to modify my diet. I've used my air fryer quite a bit. I mainly use it for chicken. I can do 5 thighs at a time, I'll add dry rub, add panko or corn meal for an added crisp. Tastes great. I highly recommend this fryer. The timer is great, it automatically turns itself off. The kitchen does not get hot at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Better to toss potatoes in a bit of oil then ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my mother and she loves it. Don't follow instructions for fries and stuff. Search the internet. Better to toss potatoes in a bit of oil then cook. Perfect that way really. use more oil in the bottom too. we really are not the healthy eaters but this is a lot healthier than we were eating
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: and I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I am diabetic, & live by myself, and I love this thing, hot dogs are great, sweet potato fries great, hamburger, meatloaf, chicken legs, toast, all have been awesome, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Crazydog

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it! It will change your life !
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase of my life. I don’t use my stove, oven or even microwave anymore. Toast?air fryer!steak?Air fryer! Bacon? Air fryer! It is easy to use and clean, quick, and using it keeps my whole kitchen clean. No grease on stove, no exploded food on the microwave, and everything tastes so much better too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: None Stop use
customer_reviews.text: Wow didn't know what all the hype was about but quickly found out! I use a few days a week for anything from a whole chicken to reheating pizza (which makes it better than it was to begin with) Even my husband who rarely cooks has started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Den~

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing appliance!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing appliance!! I have used this everyday since I received it (3 days ago) 😜 easy to use, easy to clean, and the food turns out amazing!! I made fish in it tonight and it was so good!! Looking forward to a long relationship with my new Air Frier!!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Love the air fryer until a piece broke off
customer_reviews.text: Was loving this air fryer but just outside of the warranty period and the plastic piece on the handle broke off. I think it is still usable but may need to purchase another one soon. Would probably like one with a bigger basket area as well.
customer_reviews.author: H. Greiner

customer_reviews.title: The Secura fryer is well built and super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Tried another brand that only lasted for three uses before breaking. The Secura fryer is well built and super easy to use. The best addition to my kitchen tools in a long time!!! Very happy with the quality and ease with which to use it.
customer_reviews.author: droughtsurvivor

product_meta.title: Secura Air Fryer 4.2Qt / 4.0L 1500-Watt Electric Hot XL Air Fryers Oven Oil Free Nonstick Cooker w/Additional Accessories, Recipes, BBQ Rack & Skewers for Frying, Roasting, Grilling, Baking
product_meta.description:
About the product:
Fry your favorite foods with hardly any oil! The Secura Hot Air Fryer cuts out the oil to give you crispy food without the added fat. The air fryer uses hot air in combination with high-speed air circulation (rapid hot air) and a top grill to surround food with heated air to cook all of your favorite fried foods quickly and evenly. The variable temperature control ranges from 180-390 degrees (F) and the 60-minute timer automatically shuts off the machine once cooking is complete. The frying basket has an extra large 4.0 liter capacity, making it easy to fry up snacks or a main dish for the whole family.
feature_bullets: The Secura 4.2 quart (4-liter) Electric Hot Air Fryer uses hot air in combination with high-speed air circulation (rapid hot air) and a top grill to prepare a variety of tasty dishes in a healthy, fast and easy way
Extra large 4.2 quart (4-liter) basket, more capacity than most other Air Fryers. Create Healthier food by using less grease in your cooking with the "Hot Air Cooking" method
60 minute cooking timer with auto-shut off when your food is done. Heating & Power indicator lights. Variable temperature control 180°~390°F, giving you total control over the food you are cooking
Accessories included with the Secura Hot Air Fryer for extra versatility;Recipes, BBQ rack & skewers
2-Year Manufacturer's Limited Warranty, Only for use with North American Electrical Standards,120V/1500W extra large 4.0 liter capacity

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,189 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
